trans-unit.source: Represents a composition during the text input events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 입력된 이벤트 동안 컴퍼지션을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is a FrameworkTextComposition when the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> by using an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성은 사용자가 텍스트를 입력 하는 경우에 FrameworkTextComposition는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>를 사용 하 여 프로그램 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: FrameworkTextComposition is the base class of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: FrameworkTextComposition는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> 의 기본 클래스

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> class defines properties that return <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects to indicate the position of the text composition.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>클래스를 반환 하는 속성을 정의 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>텍스트 컴퍼지션의 위치를 나타내는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>

trans-unit.source: When the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>에 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 은</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> 에 텍스트를 입력할 때

trans-unit.source: Finalizes the composition.
trans-unit.target: 컴퍼지션을 종료 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: 유니코드 기호에 현재 구성의 길이 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The CompositionLength property indicates how many characters have been entered since the last <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event.
trans-unit.target: CompositionLength 속성은 마지막 이후 입력 된 문자 수를 나타냅니다 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은만 의미 있는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, CompositionLength is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> property indicates the length of the composition.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>CompositionLength은-1, 이벤트가 발생 하면 및 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>속성 컴퍼지션의 길이 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CompositionLength는.NET Framework 버전 3.5에서에서 도입 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [버전 및 종속성](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: 유니코드 기호에 현재 구성의 길이입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 발생 하는 컴퍼지션 텍스트 위치를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은만 의미 있는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> property indicates the position of the composition text.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>이벤트가 발생 하면 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A>은-1, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A>속성 컴퍼지션 텍스트의 위치를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CompositionOffset는.NET Framework 버전 3.5에서에서 도입 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [버전 및 종속성](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 발생 하는 컴퍼지션 텍스트 위치는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 때 가져옵니다 완성된 된 유니코드 텍스트의 길이 기호의 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, ResultLength is –1.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>이벤트 발생 ResultLength은-1.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResultLength는.NET Framework 버전 3.5에서에서 도입 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [버전 및 종속성](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 때 기호의 유니코드에서 완성된 된 텍스트의 길이 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: Gets the offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 완성된 된 텍스트의 오프셋을 가져옵니다 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>이벤트가 발생 하면 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>은-1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResultOffset는.NET Framework 버전 3.5에서에서 도입 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [버전 및 종속성](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 완성된 된 텍스트의 오프셋 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>
